#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define	pii pair<int,int>
#define	vi vector<int>
#define	mp make_pair
#define	pb push_back
#define X first
#define Y second
#define	ill int long long
#define INF 1000000000
int arr[110][110][500][2];
string a,b;
int k1,k2,x,y;

int recurse(int ai, int bi, int l, int p){
	int res = INF;
	if(ai == k1 && bi == k2) return 0;
	if(ai >= k1+1) return INF;
	if(bi >= k2+1) return INF;
	if(arr[ai][bi][l][p] != -1) return arr[ai][bi][l][p];
	if(ai<k1 && bi<k2 && a[ai] == b[bi]){
		res = min(res,recurse(ai+1,bi+1,0,0));
		arr[ai][bi][l][p] = res;
		return res;
	}
	res = min(res,1 + recurse(ai+1,bi+1,0,0));
	if(p == 1) res = min(res,1 + recurse(ai+1,bi,0,1));
	else res = min(res,x + 1 + recurse(ai+1,bi,0,1));
	
	if(l == 0){
		res = min(res,x+1+recurse(ai,bi+1,x+1,0));
	}
	else if(l == y) res = min(res,recurse(ai,bi+1,l,0));
	else res = min(res,1+recurse(ai,bi+1,l+1,0));
	arr[ai][bi][l][p] = res;
	return res;
}

void solve(){
	memset(arr,-1,sizeof arr);
	scanf("%d %d",&k1,&k2);
	cin>>a>>b;
	scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
	cout<<recurse(0,0,0,0)<<endl;
	return;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		printf("Case %d: ",i+1);
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
